gridData.description: Set column label.

gridData.name: sort
gridData.description: Set column Sortable.

gridData.description: JSON key from datasource.

gridData.name: hidden
gridData.description: Hide column.

gridData.name: data-type
gridData.description: Data type of column (string/number).

gridData.name: width
gridData.description: Custom width for each column.Width must be in % but no need to mention %.

gridData.name: context-menu
gridData.description: Context Menu provides the list of menus on right click (for Array structure: refer typescript code in source tab)

gridData.name: selectedRowData
gridData.description: It will fire only on selection of checkbox and gives you selected record data.

gridData.name: rowSelect
gridData.description: It will gives you row clicked data.

gridData.name: onHeaderClick
gridData.description: It will gives you click event and column info.

gridData.name: rightClick
gridData.description: It is fired when clicked on context menu providing row data and selected context menu data.

gridData.name: onPageChange
gridData.description: It is fired when server side pagination is enable. It will gives you pageNumber, current and next state of pagination.

gridData.name: color-palette
gridData.description: classic/ vibrant/ random/ specific (vibrant: amexio-theme-color5)

gridData.name: gradient
gridData.description: If true

gridData.name: Right/Left Arrow
gridData.description: Moves focus one cell to the right/left.If focus is on the right-most/left-most cell in the row, focus does not move.

gridData.name: Down Arrow
gridData.description: Moves focus one cell down.If focus is on the bottom cell in the column, focus does not move.

gridData.name: Up Arrow
gridData.description: Moves focus one cell Up.If focus is on the top cell in the column, focus does not move.

gridData.name: Page Down
gridData.description: Moves focus down scrolling so the bottom row in the currently visible set of rows becomes the first visible row.If focus is in the last row, focus does not move.

gridData.name: Page Up
gridData.description: Moves focus up scrolling so the top row in the currently visible set of rows becomes the last visible row.If focus is in the first row of the grid, focus does not move.

gridData.name: Home
gridData.description: Moves focus to the first cell in the row that contains focus.

gridData.name: End
gridData.description: Moves focus to the last cell in the row that contains focus.
